system.description: The character bumps up another character's power.
system.effect: The character picks one power from another character within 5 spaces and boosts it. If the power has ranges or effective areas or durations, these are doubled. If the power affects a damage multiplier, add 1 to the effect. Any effects that normally happen with a Fantastic success automatically happen on any success not just a Fantastic one. If the power has a cost, the character muss pay it as well, with a minimum of 5 Focus.
